reviewText: Excellent movies.  I received them fast and intact and good condition.

DVDs won't play on US DVD player. By the time I realized this it was too late to return it. Apparently there is a warning somewhere, but I'm very disappointed that this wasn't pointed out more prominently in the description. Who really reads the description of a movie that they know they want to buy?

I bought one of these big time rip off,  it will not work on your player in America, they say you can rigg your player to play all CDs but I attempted it and everyone I could ever find and it failed miserably, when you contact the company they just laugh at you !!!!
Will not play in my dvd player
Item is not legit. It cannot be played because it was not formatted. Total bs.

This will not play on your DVD in the U.S., U.S. Territories, Canada, and Bermuda!!!  There was a warning on the order page, but I didn't see it.  The item arrived, I put it in my dvd player and it wouldn't play.... :(
